metadata.dc:author: Ferreruela, R
Navarro, V
López-Benito, I
Berbegal, J
metadata.dc:description: We present a new case of bacterial spontaneous peritonitis cirrhosis, associated to an extremely rare germ as it is Pasteurella multocida. We describe its clinical characteristics and evolution after treatment.
metadata.dc:title: Peritonitis primaria espontánea por Pasteurella multocida.
[Spontaneous primary peritonitis due to Pasteurella multocida].
